name: Paperbike
description:
Cycling around

Paperbike!

A homage to Paperboy  (Arcade-1985)

Controls

  • Keyboard movement: WASD/Arrows
  • Controller movement: Left Analog Stick
  • Confirm/Throw: Space or A button on Controllers

Description

Student Project at BUAS DP Y1 B2
221550 - Luca Vassalli - Team Paperboy

Special thanks
Vittorio for the original sounds and music and the whole Paperboy team for being super cool!
